scripts.buildAndPush: react-scripts build && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { $dest='E:\Software\firmora'; $src='build'; if (-not (Test-Path \"$dest\.git\")) { throw 'Hedef git repo deÄŸil' }; Get-ChildItem -LiteralPath $dest -Force | ? { $_.Name -ne '.git' } | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force; Copy-Item -Path \"$src\*\" -Destination $dest -Recurse -Force -Container; git -C $dest add -A; $diff = git -C $dest status --porcelain; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($diff)) { Write-Host 'No changes, skipping commit/push.'; exit 0 }; $stamp=Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'; git -C $dest commit -m \"auto build: $stamp\"; git -C $dest push }"
